text.text_translated: Being more aware of possible differences in what people expect and how they act can help us avoid misunderstandings. It is very important to remember that cultural stereotypes (simple ideas about an entire group that are often inaccurate) can damage good business relationships. Although a country's culture can influence how we behave and think, we are also influenced by the region we come from and the communities we belong to. Our age, gender, the culture of our company, and our own life experiences also shape us. Therefore we should keep the knowledge of possible differences in the back of our minds and not label every person from an entire country.
